channel.title: Ayus on Pantrypoints
channel.description: Recent content in Ayus on Pantrypoints

item.title: New Partners: Ayus and SCENAC
item.description: We welcome more partners implementing our moneyless points system: /graphics/ayus.jpg Ayus Ayus is a health store that sells alternative remedies such as those from ayurveda and homoeopathy. They will use trade points for their loyal customers. SCENAC SCENAC is a non-goverment organization (NGO) that supports senior citizens. They will test the moneyless social insurance system.
